blog.name: mxltifandoms-imagines
blog.title: Mxltifandoms Imagines
blog.description: Writing about characters you won't see a lot of on tumblr. You can see the fandoms I write about in fandoms list . If you don't see your favorite character there, you can ask me. Feel free to talk to me, too. I do imagines, moodboards, would involves, text messages and AU Memes.

summary: IMAGINE TONY FLIRTING WITH YOU AND BRUCE GETTING JEALOUS. The Doctor shared a glance with the Billionaire Philanthropist, and...
caption:
IMAGINE TONY FLIRTING WITH YOU AND BRUCE GETTING JEALOUS.

The Doctor shared a glance with the Billionaire Philanthropist, and for a while some sparks appeared in Bruce’s big eyes. Tony had been flirting with you for a while, and it had been fine for some seconds but when Bruce saw his real intentions he felt…attacked.

Everybody in Earth knew who was Tony Stark and for sure his reputation with women, but he thought that Tony was the type of men who respect his friends; nevertheless, it didn’t happen. It wouldn’t have been a big deal if Bruce would stay out of that situation, but then he saw you and everything changed.

“You should stay away from her, Tony.” - Bruce said to his friend when you left the laboratory, although there was calm in his voice. “You don’t have to be the womanizer you are always.”

“What am hearing? Perhaps, are you jealous, Doctor Banner?”

summary: You ever think about how Dum-E is going to be the ring bearer at Bucky and Tony’s wedding? Peter is going to be the flower boy,...
body: You ever think about how Dum-E is going to be the ring bearer at Bucky and Tony’s wedding? Peter is going to be the flower boy, a job he pretended to be annoyed with but in reality fucking loves is, and Rhodey is going to be the one to give Tony away.

reblog.comment: You ever think about how Dum-E is going to be the ring bearer at Bucky and Tony’s wedding? Peter is going to be the flower boy, a job he pretended to be annoyed with but in reality fucking loves is, and Rhodey is going to be the one to give Tony away.

summary: Tony: Welcome home! I made your favourite! Clint: Oh, god... Tony: Take-away pizza! Clint: Oh, thank god.

tags: idk you know im open to essentially anything
body:
Send 💡for a headcanon!

Send 💡and a word/polyship/topic/AU/whatever for a headcanon because I’m not quite able to write ficlets at the moment thanks to university keeping me busy but I really want to get some creative juices flowing and deliver a bit more ideas to the community!

by spicyjarvis

blog.name: kimlikesfood
blog.title: Badassllamaclan’s Fandom Dump
blog.description: This is basically my side blog where I can reblog all the artwork and things that don’t necessarily go with my main blog. Which is kinda stupid since my blog barely has a theme to begin with, but you get the point.

summary: I vote we ban the necessity to use the tag “not Pepper friendly”, because it’s really un-fucking-necessary to bash a character...
body: I vote we ban the necessity to use the tag “not Pepper friendly”, because it’s really un-fucking-necessary to bash a character just because they’re in the way of your ship, and especially so when it comes to Pepper Potts. Like she hasn’t done anything, there’s no need to make her out to be a shitty person just so you can ship Tony with someone else. Like you can just make it so they never ended up together in the first place. Or you can have them break up mutually or at least on decent terms. Pepper has been there for him through a lot, there’s no need to make her an out of character shitty person.

reblog.comment: I vote we ban the necessity to use the tag “not Pepper friendly”, because it’s really un-fucking-necessary to bash a character just because they’re in the way of your ship, and especially so when it comes to Pepper Potts. Like she hasn’t done anything, there’s no need to make her out to be a shitty person just so you can ship Tony with someone else. Like you can just make it so they never ended up together in the first place. Or you can have them break up mutually or at least on decent terms. Pepper has been there for him through a lot, there’s no need to make her an out of character shitty person.

trail.content_raw: I vote we ban the necessity to use the tag “not Pepper friendly”, because it’s really un-fucking-necessary to bash a character just because they’re in the way of your ship, and especially so when it comes to Pepper Potts. Like she hasn’t done anything, there’s no need to make her out to be a shitty person just so you can ship Tony with someone else. Like you can just make it so they never ended up together in the first place. Or you can have them break up mutually or at least on decent terms. Pepper has been there for him through a lot, there’s no need to make her an out of character shitty person.
trail.content: I vote we ban the necessity to use the tag “not Pepper friendly”, because it’s really un-fucking-necessary to bash a character just because they’re in the way of your ship, and especially so when it comes to Pepper Potts. Like she hasn’t done anything, there’s no need to make her out to be a shitty person just so you can ship Tony with someone else. Like you can just make it so they never ended up together in the first place. Or you can have them break up mutually or at least on decent terms. Pepper has been there for him through a lot, there’s no need to make her an out of character shitty person.
